data.text: When entering the dormitory in the Temple Hospice, the first Tome is on top of the leftmost bunk on the far side (the screenshot is taken looking back).

In the North Maintenance Shaft, open the left Door on the bottom floor. In order to do this you will need to press the "wrong" brick (one which symbol that doesn't correspond to the marking on the upstairs door needed to progress) BEFORE opening all three doors on the upper level. A simple tactic is to keep pressing the left brick until the correct one opens.

Walk through the door into the sewers until you find a room to your right. There is a "Suspicious Brick" behind a bookshelf which can be reached by climbing the fallen bookshelf, activate it to lower another door just outside this room.
In the Garrison Sewers, go to the left here:
The second Tome is in a crate near the wooden wall.
